column4: why is Ubuntu not installing packages from my dvd?  i fired up Add/Remove Programs, and turned off all the repository options, put the dvd in and it's *still* asking to me to connect to the internet.
i thought that if the source options were turned off in Add/Remove, that it would automatically comment out those lines in sources.list.  checking the file
all the lines are commented out except for the dvd line......
